vic01.name: Vic
vic01.desc:
Hey man! Looking for work? Boss Vincenzo is looking for tough fighters like you.

I want to check out what you're capable first, bro. Some monsters are spotted close on our turf. Deal with them and I'll pay you nicely.

vic02.name: Vic
vic02.desc:
Listen up, bro. People have been talking about how well you fought those monsters, but Boss Vincenzo still wants to know if you're the real deal.

There are some up to no good goblins sighted close to our turf ready to raid. Why don't you teach them a lesson to not mess with the Luppino family?

vic03.name: Vic
vic03.desc:
My man! Boss Vincenzo is impressed with your fighting. He think it's time you get a taste of the turf war here in New Haven, bro.

Some territories of The Embraced are poorly defended right now. We need you to strike hard and fast, take them by surprise, and show them who's boss. Are you up for the challenge?
